timeline.message:
EQL: Expand verification tests

Fix some error messaging consistency in EqlParser

Related to https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/51873

timeline.author: astefan
astefan

replies.bodyText: I kind of liked the one line visual separation between successful and failure cases in here
replies.author: aleksmaus

replies.bodyText: This empty line is at the end of the method, before the closing } bracket...
replies.author: astefan

timeline.bodyText: I think this error message is wrong, unless EQL plans to support MATCH/QUERY predicates.
timeline.author: astefan

replies.bodyText: @aleksmaus please raise an issue and mark it as discuss to get consensus about how we deal with exact matches on analyzed fields - whether we prevent any exact comparison against them or introduce some other type of comparison (inexact matches - say ~=).
replies.author: costin

timeline.author: astefan

replies.bodyText: Discussed with Costin, the behavior is correct, the error message can be improved in the context of EQL. Agreed  on leaving the test as is and open an "issue" for error messaging improvement for this particular case. Possibly can bring up for discussion for our weekly.
replies.author: aleksmaus

timeline.message: Add the test for bad query that starts with number
